description:
In this course we will go over a variety of methods for drawing and also how we can use a digital format to enhance these methods.

We will be using Adobe Photoshop and we will start by going over the main tools used for drawing and get into the principal methods for digital drawing.

We will go over a variety of topics such as contour lines, hatching techniques and finally we will look at how we combine all these digital drawing techniques to produce a composition.

This course goes over a variety of techniques that can be used in both digital drawing and traditional drawing.

By the end of this course you will know how to create your own digital drawing from start to finish.
title: Learn Digital Drawing in Photoshop
